application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description:
Details of Crime Prevention pursuant to condition 34 of planning permission ref: 193424HYBRID dated 11/11/2020 for Hybrid planning application for the phased demolition of all existing buildings and structures and all site preparation works followed by a mixed-use phased development comprising residential units and non-residential floorspace, including flexible commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1-A5, B1 and D1-D2), and community floorspace (Use Class D1); landscaping; removal and replacement of trees; public realm improvements; access alterations; car & cycle parking; and other highway works incidental to the development. Outline planning permission for phased demolition of all existing buildings and structures, all site preparation works and redevelopment to provide new homes (Use Class C3); community (Use Class D1) floorspace; cycle and vehicle parking; highway and access improvements; and landscape and public realm improvements associated with those blocks. Full planning permission for phased demolition of all existing
buildings and structures and all site preparation works and Blocks A, B, G, and H comprising homes (Use Class C3); flexible commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1-A5, B1 and D1-D2); energy centre; cycle and vehicle parking; highway and access improvements; and landscape and public realm improvements associated with those blocks.
An Environmental Statement has been submitted with the application under the Town and Country Planning (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations 2017, as amended.
